description: Hi there! I am an aspiring associate software engineer looking to start growing their career. Having completed my Bachelor's of Science in Computer Science (with a focus on Programming Language design, Compilers and Machine Learning), I am ready to start applying what I have learned to deliver high quality code to end users.
I always keep learning; whether it is a new web framework, a new programming language, or diving close to the hardware, I have an insatiable curiosity.

bullets.point: Laravel PHP for quickly developing RESTful API endpoints and connecting web apps to MySQL-like databases using the Eloquent ORM
Creating my own personal web app (this one) using ReactJS, Emotion for styling, and hosted on Heroku

Exploring lower-level operating system Kernel development, by starting with writing a bootloader using NASM, switching from real mode to protected mode, and jumping to C code using an emulated Intel i386.

description: I want to learn from the best software engineers to deliver high quality software to end users. I enjoy growing my skill set using both old and new technologies, solving challenging problems across the software stack. Best of all, I want to contribute to new and existing work by bringing a humble perspective, curiosity, and friendliness.
